name: petitgrain
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an oil that is taken from the bitter orange tree and is used to make perfume (= a liquid with a pleasant smell), or for rubbing into a person's body during massage: Petitgrain has a fresh floral citrus scent with a woody herbaceous undertone. Lavender, ylang ylang, petitgrain, and coconut oil leave skin feeling soft.
More examplesFewer examplesPetitgrain was one of the ingredients of the original "eau-de-cologne".The body wash contains refreshing grapefruit and petitgrain essential oils.The three scents are: Relax (with bay and lavender), De-stress (with camomile) and Revive (with invigorating pink grapefruit and petitgrain).
